item.title: Mecoco Meaningful Contribution in your Community
item.description: MM - Michael McEwan JT - Jenny Trott MM On this podcast, I went to find out about a social enterprise based in Ayrshire called Mecoco. I went to speak to Jenny Trott and found out more about the enterprise. MM So, what is your social enterprise all about? JT So, Mecoco stands for meaningful contribution in your community and itâ€™s a social enterprise that I set up a couple of years ago, really because my son who was approaching school leaving age and has complex learning and physical disabilities.
